hero.title: Protect Your Operations — Naturally
hero.subtitle: JellyGuard keeps seawater intakes clear and ecosystems thriving with biomimetic technology inspired by ocean balance.

opening.title: When Jellyfish Swarms Disrupt Operations
opening.text: Across coasts and seas, jellyfish blooms shut down power plants, desalination facilities, cooling intakes, disrupt fishing operations, and close tourist beaches — costing millions in downtime and emergency response. Traditional barriers harm marine life and demand intensive maintenance. There's a better way.

promise.title: Biomimetic Protection Technology
promise.text: A passive, biomimetic approach that guides jellyfish away from intake zones and concentrates them in a thin surface layer for safe removal — without chemicals, shredding, or ecosystem disruption.

impact.title: A Growing Crisis in Oceans and Seas
problem_points: Blooms disrupt energy, water, fishing and tourism.
Warming seas and oceans increase frequency and scale.
Conventional solutions are costly or harmful.
solution_points: Works with ocean and sea currents and natural behavior.

steps.title: Four-Step Protection System
descriptions: Detect bloom presence and water-flow patterns.
Use natural buoyancy and flow to lift organisms.
Concentrate in a safe, thin surface layer.
